point_1.title: Introduction
point_1.description: Introduce the main characters, setting, and the initial situation.

point_2.title: Conflict Introduction
point_2.description: Introduce the main conflict or problem that the characters need to solve.

point_3.title: Rising Action
point_3.description: Describe the events that lead up to the climax, including challenges and important developments.

details.obstacles: Describe obstacles faced by characters here

point_4.title: Climax
point_4.description: Detail the most intense part of the story where the main conflict reaches its peak.

details.resolution_attempts: List attempts to resolve the conflict here

point_5.title: Resolution
point_5.description: Explain how the conflict is resolved and what happens to the characters afterward.

details.outcome: Describe the outcome of the conflict here
details.character_fate: Explain what happens to the characters here
details.lessons_learned: List any lessons learned or themes concluded here
